SUMMARY: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class Ext.ux.netbox.number.NumberField

Extends Ext.ux.netbox.core.Field.
Defined in NumberField.js

This is the class that implements the field to use if the data to filter is a number. It contains as default the following operation:

  • NUMBER_EQUAL
  • NUMBER_NOT_EQUAL
  • NUMBER_GREATER
  • NUMBER_GREATER_OR_EQUAL
  • NUMBER_LESS
  • NUMBER_LESS_OR_EQUAL
  • NUMBER_RANGE
The default operation is NUMBER_EQUAL
